channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overgrown hedge impeding lorries., 2nd June
item.description:
A delivery by lorry (built on the same chassis as fire engines) had problems passing the sorned camper van and the hedge. Obviously in an emergency fire engines would have problems getting to properties further down the lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): White Towers Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sink hole, 2nd June
item.description:
Road is collapsing rapidly over last 48 hours. Almost came off my bike when I hit this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1a WESTDOWN, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large vehicles obstructing public footway, 2nd June
item.description:
This is a continuous problem, women, children are forced on to the busy Cirencester Road in order to navigate this obstruction that overhangs the entire pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 119 Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New street light permantly illuminated, 2nd June
item.description:
Finally, a new light has been fitted to the lighting column in the middle of the roundabout at the Gloucester Road / Queens Road junction. However, the light appears to be permanently illumined. Was on at 5.30pm on Tuesday, and again this morning (8.00am) - both times in bright sunlight. Great to see a working light back at this location, but would be nicer if it worked properly (i.e. not on all day).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 264 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Low-hanging branches obstructing pavement / cycle path, 2nd June
item.description:
Tree branches overhanging pavement and cycle path, causing obstructions. A40 Lansdown Road, between end of Glencairn Park Road and Co-op Funerals.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 72 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3x 20cm potholes on Northbound A417, 2nd June
item.description:
There are three 20cm potholes spread out up the hill on the Northbound lane of the A417 as it goes up and out of Nettleton
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Birdlip

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Highclere Roman Road, Birdlip

item.title: Road deteriorated around manhole, 1st June
item.description:
